headcfg.desc: 贷款发放分类表，贷款余额汇总表统计项

headcfg: { signleAmountInfo : {itemTitle:"单笔金额", items:[ {itemTitle : "1. 5万元以下(含)",express : "(appAmount <= 5)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "2. 5万元至10万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 5 && appAmount <= 10)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "3. 10万元至20万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 10 && appAmount <= 20)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "4. 20万元至30万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 20 && appAmount <= 30)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "5. 30万元至50万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 30 && appAmount <= 50)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "6. 50万元至100万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 50 && appAmount <= 100)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "7. 100万元至200万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 100 && appAmount <= 200)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "8. 200万元至300万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 200 && appAmount <= 300)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "9. 300万元至500万元(含)",express : "(appAmount > 300 && appAmount <= 500)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]}, {itemTitle : "10. 500万元以上",express : "(appAmount > 500)",fields:[{name:"appAmount",type:2}]} ] }, loanLimitInfo : {itemTitle:"期限类型", items : [ {itemTitle : "1. 1个月以内(含)[短期]",express : "(loanLimit <= 1)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "2. 1至3个月(含)[短期]",express : "(loanLimit > 1 && loanLimit <= 3)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "3. 3至6个月(含)[短期]",express : "(loanLimit > 3 && loanLimit <= 6)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "4. 6至12个月(含)[短期]",express : "(loanLimit > 6 && loanLimit <= 12)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "1. 1年至1年半(含)[中期]",express : "(loanLimit > 12 && loanLimit <= 18)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "2. 1年半至2年(含)[中期]",express : "(loanLimit > 18 && loanLimit <= 24)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "3. 2年至2年半(含)[中期]",express : "(loanLimit > 24 && loanLimit <= 30)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "4. 2年半至3年(含)[中期]",express : "(loanLimit > 30 && loanLimit <= 36)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]}, {itemTitle : "1. 3年以上[长期]",express : "(loanLimit > 36)",fields:[{name:"loanLimit",type:1}]} ] } }
